meanings.sent1: The bottom of the cup was dreggy with leftover coffee.
meanings.sent2: The old well had a dreggy smell from stagnant water.
meanings.sent3: The dreggy mud on his shoes made squelching sounds as he walked.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt dreggy, filled with leftover thoughts from the day.
meanings.sent5: The dreggy residue in the sink was difficult to clean.

meanings.sent1: The dreggy taste of the soup made it unappetizing.
meanings.sent2: The dreggy appearance of the pond indicated poor water quality.
meanings.sent3: The dreggy music playing in the background was oddly soothing.
meanings.sent4: His dreggy mood matched the gloomy weather outside.
meanings.sent5: The dreggy film left a bitter aftertaste in her mind.
